alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 18 at 9:52AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release. * WHERE...A portion of northern Indiana, including the following county, White. * WHEN...Through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Continued releases may prolong any ongoing flooding of rivers, low-lying and flood-prone locations, and street flooding downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Dam releases greater than 9000 cfs expected into Saturday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
